      • setBackupLogger

        public boolean setBackupLogger(java.lang.String bl)
                        throws java.rmi.RemoteException
        this method should set the backup logger. log method of the backup logger is always called by this logger's log method. this method will set the backupLogger if it was not set already.
        Specified by:
        setBackupLogger in interface IntRemoteLog
        Parameters:
        bl - URI of the backup logger.
        Returns:
        true if backup logger is set, false otherwise.
        Throws:
        java.rmi.RemoteException - if occur in RMI framework.
